name: Office Jump
description:
-Game Overview

 

The goal of our office worker is to rise in his career by jumping over the rooms. Game’s audition will be 7+. Character moves with A, D, Space and shot with F

 

-Game Play and Mechanics

 

Try to jump from random rooms and get the highest score..

 

-Story, Setting, Character

 

Man is an office worker. That day, the man who falls asleep instead of work falls into a deep sleep. In him dream he tries to reach the top position at work.

 

-Interface

 

It is basic menu

 

-Technical

 

Target Hardware: Windows PC.

Development hardware and software: Developed on Windows PC with Unity.

Network requirements: Not needed.
